page.title: 03PAUL'S DAY IN KINNEFF
page.content: I got up at 7a.m. I washed my face and hair then had breakfast. I watched Popeye on television then brushed my teeth and got ready for school. I cycled down to call for Barry. We went to the shop for our playpiece. At school we did Maths,Language and then spoke about a policeman. At interval we played on the computer. We had pies and milkshake for lunch. After lunch we did English and cycling proficiency. I got home at 3.30p.m. and changed my clothes. I went to the shop for potatoes. I then went down to the village to play. I came back and helped my stepbrother with a few logs. After tea I went back down to the village to play on my bicycle with my friend. At 9p.m. I had a shower and went to bed.
